chapters.title: Chapter 9: A Pair of Silverpike
chapters.info: Nicola Treehill, p. 180 (220)—Slender, black-haired, dark-eyed novice; she is about Nynaeve's age. She was a refugee from Ghealdan. She has already developed several Talents, including the ability to see ta'veren and Foretelling, although what she Foretells is usually in such language that only poets can understand it. Her potential exceeds that of all Aes Sedai currently alive, with the exception of Egwene, Elayne, and Nynaeve. See also Nermasiv, Areina.
